        Parameters:
        currentLine - each line inside the location.csv
        lineCounter - the id of the location to be added in
        Returns:

        Returns:

      • validateMA

        public static boolean validateMA(java.lang.String macAdd)
        process the validation of mac-address, check whether it is a SHA-1 hash value(a hexadecimal number, 40 digits long)
        Parameters:
        macAdd - the mac-address to be validated
        Returns:
        an boolean value to show the results

      • validateLID

        public static boolean validateLID(java.lang.String locationId)
        process the validation of locationId, check whether the location id is a positive long value
        Parameters:
        locationId - the location id to be validated
        Returns:
        an boolean value to show the results

      • validateEmail

        public static boolean validateEmail(java.lang.String email)
        process the validation of email, check the format xxx.@.smu.edu.sg where school is either business, accountancy, sis, economics, law, or socsc, and year is between 2010 (inclusive) to 2014 (inclusive). xxx should contains only letters (a-z or A-Z), numbers or dot.
        Parameters:
        email - the email to be validated
        Returns:
        an boolean value to show the results

      • validateSemanticPlace

        public static boolean validateSemanticPlace(java.lang.String school)
        process the validation of Semantic Place, check the format "SMUSISL" or "SMUSISB" and the subsequent number
        Parameters:
        school - is the semantic place to be validated
        Returns:
        an boolean value to show the results
